medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began about 10 hours ago, 3 hours after dinner. The patient reported progressively increasing nausea and some vomiting this morning. Last bowel movement was yesterday and felt somewhat constipated. No previous episodes of steatorrhea, diarrhea, hematochezia, or melena. No jaundice. The patient is intentionally losing weight, approximately 25 lbs over the past four months.
medical_history.family_history: No history of gallstones or biliary disease.
